DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind study motavizumab palivizumab administer sequentially high-risk child RSV season . It anticipate approximately 240 child ( 80 group ) would enrol southern hemisphere upcoming RSV season ( 2006 ) . Children randomize one three regimens 1:1:1 ratio ; first group receive 2 dos motavizumab follow 3 dos palivizumab ; second group receive 2 dos palivizumab follow 3 dos motavizumab ; third group receive 5 dos motavizumab . Motavizumab palivizumab administer 15 mg/kg IM injection every 30 day , total 5 injection .
